title: Shayzien armour (tier 5)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Shayzien armour (5) is a set of armour that requires 20 Defence to wear. In order to receive tier 5 Shayzien armour, players must have 100% Shayzien favour and own all pieces of tier 4 Shayzien armour. Its defence bonuses are between steel armour and black armour.

content:
A male player wearing tier 5 Shayzien armour.
A female player wearing tier 5 Shayzien armour.

Shayzien armour (5) is a set of armour that requires 20 Defence to wear. In order to receive tier 5 Shayzien armour, players must have 100% Shayzien favour and own all pieces of tier 4 Shayzien armour. Its defence bonuses are between steel armour and black armour.

Note: Players may destroy any pieces of Shayzien armour they have acquired. But to fight higher tier soldiers again player must have full set of armour that is no more than 1 tier lower than that soldier.

It is dropped by the tier 5 soldier at the Combat Ring in Shayzien. Players must kill the soldier 5 times in order to receive all the pieces.

The set also protects players from the poison attack of the lizardman shaman. This effect is increased per added piece, with each piece giving around a 1/5th damage reduction, capping at a full 100% damage reduction with all 5 pieces.
